short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect your Gmail privacy by blurring content until you hover over it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BlurGmail is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your email privacy with minimal effort. By automatically blurring email content on hover, BlurGmail helps protect sensitive information from unauthorized viewing, making it ideal for use in public or shared spaces.

Key Features:

Automatic Blurring: Instantly applies a blur effect to email content when you hover over it, ensuring that private information remains concealed.

Customizable Settings: Tailor the blurring effect to your preference with adjustable intensity and targeted settings for specific emails or sections.

Real-Time Monitoring: Seamlessly integrates with your Gmail account, continuously applying the blurring effect to new emails as they arrive.

User-Friendly Installation: Easy to install and set up, BlurGmail integrates smoothly with Gmail for a hassle-free experience.

Privacy Protection: Designed with user privacy as a priority, ensuring your email content is only visible to you while maintaining security.


How It Works:

Install the Extension: Download BlurGmail from the Chrome Web Store and add it to your browser.

Configure Your Preferences: Adjust the settings to suit your privacy needs and preferences.

Hover to Blur: Simply hover over any email content to activate the blur effect, safeguarding your information from onlookers.

Whether youâ€™re on the go, working in a shared environment, or just want extra privacy, BlurGmail provides a simple yet effective solution for keeping your email content secure. Install it today and experience enhanced privacy with ease.
